trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when the platform dependency is not found during activation of the ClickOnce deployment and the deployment will not run.
trans-unit.target: 在激活的 ClickOnce 部署和部署过程中找不到平台依赖项时引发的异常将不会运行。

trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when there is a mismatch between the platform requested in the deployment manifest and the platform that ClickOnce is trying to run the application on.
trans-unit.target: 部署清单中请求的平台和 ClickOnce 尝试上运行应用程序的平台的不匹配时引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: In this context, "platform" can refer to the operating system, the installed versions of the common language runtime, or a previously installed assembly.
trans-unit.target: 在此上下文中，"平台"可以指操作系统，公共语言运行时，或者将以前安装的程序集已安装版本。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the ClickOnce application asserts that it requires Windows XP and the user is trying to run the application on Windows 2000, this exception will occur.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 ClickOnce 应用程序断言它需要 Windows XP，并且用户尝试运行该应用程序在 Windows 2000 中，将发生此异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.DependentPlatformMissingException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Deployment.Application.DependentPlatformMissingException"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "DefaultMessageDisplayedByParameterlessCtorWriterMustSupply".
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>属性为系统提供的消息描述诸如"DefaultMessageDisplayedByParameterlessCtorWriterMustSupply"的错误，将新实例。</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.InsufficientMemoryException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.InsufficientMemoryException>.</xref:System.InsufficientMemoryException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The localized error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|本地化的错误消息字符串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.DependentPlatformMissingException"></xref> class with a specified message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Deployment.Application.DependentPlatformMissingException"></xref>使用指定的描述错误的消息的类。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DependentPlatformMissingException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Deployment.Application.DependentPlatformMissingException>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.DependentPlatformMissingException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string specified in `message`.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|中指定的错误消息字符串`message`。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: 描述异常的消息。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.DependentPlatformMissingException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Deployment.Application.DependentPlatformMissingException"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象过程中调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化的对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 有关源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.DependentPlatformMissingException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Deployment.Application.DependentPlatformMissingException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用的类。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 前一个异常的直接结果应包含中的前一个异常的引用引发的异常，<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed to the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性返回相同的值传递到构造函数，或`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性不会提供给构造函数的内部异常值。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DependentPlatformMissingException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.Deployment.Application.DependentPlatformMissingException>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.DependentPlatformMissingException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string specified in `message`.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|中指定的错误消息字符串`message`。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: 描述异常的消息。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the `innerException` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`innerException`参数不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>中, 引发当前异常<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>处理内部异常的块。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.DependentPlatformMissingException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Deployment.Application.DependentPlatformMissingException"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The exception message.
trans-unit.target: 异常消息。

trans-unit.source: The URL to visit for product support information.
trans-unit.target: 要访问产品支持信息的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object data.
trans-unit.target: 获取对象数据。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化的对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 有关源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets a URI that indicates where support can be found for the problem encountered.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 URI，指示可以找到有关遇到的问题的支持的位置。

trans-unit.source: A URI that indicates where support can be found for the problem encountered.
trans-unit.target: 一个 URI，指示可以找到有关遇到的问题的支持的位置。
